name: Burnham Smith Park
description: Burnham Smith Park is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Corcoran, CA. There are 4 outdoor concrete courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. The courts are free. The facility includes amenities like restrooms, lights, and wheelchair accessibility.

name: Hanford Pickleball Club
description: Come play pickleball at Hanford Pickleball Club in Hanford, CA! There are 10 outdoor hard courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. The facility includes amenities like restrooms, water, and wheelchair accessibility. A membership is required to play.

name: The Pickleball Farm
description: Come play pickleball at The Pickleball Farm in Hanford, CA! There are 2 outdoor concrete courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. A one-time fee is required to play. Amenities include lights and restrooms. The courts cannot be reserved.
